import random

wn = turtle.Screen()

player = turtle.Turtle()

for i in range(4):
    col = random.choice(['red','blue','green'])
    player.color(col)

    player.forward(100)
    player.left(90)

    choice = random.randint(1,10)
    player.write(choice)
